concept.title: 235.070-2 Indemnification under contracts involving both research and development and other work.

conbody.p: These contracts may provide for indemnification under the authority of both 10 U.S.C. 2354 and Pub. L. 85-804. Pub. L. 85-804 will apply only to work to which 10 U.S.C. 2354 does not apply. Actions under Pub. L. 85-804 must also comply with FAR 50.104-3.
